item.title: US Stocks Set to Push Higher as Oracle Soars: Markets Wrap
item.description: US stocks are set to notch fresh highs after Oracle Corp. surged on a blowout outlook and traders bet that a pair of inflation reports won’t derail the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates.

item.title: US Stocks Set to Push Higher as Oracle Soars: Markets Wrap
item.description: US stocks are set to notch fresh highs after Oracle Corp. surged on a blowout outlook and traders bet that a pair of inflation reports won’t derail the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates.

item.title: Oracle on Pace to Add $190 Billion in Value on Blowout Forecast
item.description: Oracle Corp. is on track to add about $190 billion to its market value after a blowout revenue forecast for its cloud infrastructure business sent the stock soaring.

item.title: Oracle’s $200 Billion Market Cap Surge to Lift it Above JPMorgan
item.description: Oracle Corp. is set to vault past stocks such as JPMorgan Chase & Co. to become the 10th most valuable member of the S&P 500, after a blowout cloud business forecast sent its shares soaring.

item.title: Oracle Needs to Keep Sales Growth Humming After $200 Billion Run
item.description: The pressure is on for Oracle Corp. to deliver another quarter of accelerating revenue growth driven by spending on artificial intelligence after a run-up in its shares this year.
